page.title: 18Home Computer Survey.
page.content: Over the past few years home computers have become extremely popular.Many homes now have a computer and these are used in a variety of ways,but mainly for games. Our survey showed that in our school, Moatfield,{178}out of{600 children} i.e.{approx 30%}had a computer.There were{15 types of computer}and the most popular of these was the{ZX Sinclair {Spectrum}followed by the{CBM Vic 20.} These models cost in the region of{ {Â£100,}though prices are falling as the market has become saturated.Most computers were attached to {cassette {recorders.}These were found to be slow at loading programs and while being sufficient for games were too slow for more complicated programs. Most children bought their software from{W.H.Smith.}The most popular game was{Daley Thompson's Decathlon.
